function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Worry and fear related to physical symptoms potentially linked to infection","Impact":"Increased anxiety and fear of infection, potentially leading to depression and post-traumatic stress","Mitigation":"Provide accurate information and education about symptoms and infection risks, offer mental health support","Technologies":"Telehealth platforms for mental health support, educational websites and apps for information dissemination","People":"Individuals experiencing physical symptoms, pregnant women, individuals with young children","Owner":"Healthcare providers, mental health professionals"},{"Description":"Social isolation and uncertainty related to restrictions and lockdown measures","Impact":"Increased anxiety, depression, loneliness, and reduced social support","Mitigation":"Implement virtual social interactions, provide mental health support, offer clear communication about measures and updates","Technologies":"Video conferencing platforms, telehealth services, communication apps for updates","People":"General population, healthcare workers, pregnant women, individuals with young children","Owner":"Public health authorities, employers, mental health professionals"},{"Description":"Distress, frustration, and loneliness due to confinement and loss of social/physical contact","Impact":"Increased boredom, frustration, sensations of hopelessness, and suicidal behavior","Mitigation":"Promote activities for self-care and social engagement, offer support for coping with loneliness and frustration","Technologies":"Virtual social engagement platforms, mental health apps for coping strategies, online support groups","People":"General population, individuals with childhood maltreatment experience, individuals with extreme sensory processing patterns","Owner":"Communities, mental health professionals, support organizations"}]}
